bibl.title: Herodotus' Description of the East Mediterranean Coast. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Herodotus' description is seen to reflect socio-ethnic and political arrangements in effect since the Late Bronze Age which continued through the Iron Age and into the Hellenistic period.
bibl.seg: RAINEY Anson F., Herodotus' Description of the East Mediterranean Coast. Avec résumé en anglais.
Herodotus' description is seen to reflect socio-ethnic and political arrangements in effect since the Late Bronze Age which continued through the Iron Age and into the Hellenistic period.
